content: decreased *you can place a removable progress keeper at the beginning of row one to make it easier to keep track of where you started your toe this will come in handy when knitting your second sock i recommend keeping the progress keepers on your first sock until you complete your second sock in order to match the length of sock one to sock two row 2 k all sts repeat row 1 and 2 until there are 4 sts on needles one and three and 8 sts on needle two using needle three k the four sts on needle one you should now have 8 sts on each of the two remaining needles cut yarn leaving a tail of at least 12 long thread tapestry needle and graft toe closed using the kitchener stitch weave in ends kitchener stitch tutorial https //www purlsoho com/create/kitchener-stitch-video/ copyright 2019 yarn café creations christy houghton vanilla frosting by christy houghton 5 thank you for downloading my pattern i appreciate your support any comments or suggestions can be sent to yarncafecreations@gmail com and don t forget to check out my hand-dyed yarn here https //yarncafecreations com copyright 2019 yarn café creations christy houghton
